body.name: One Shot Pore Clear Toner Pad, Korean Skincare, Toner Pad, Pore Toner, Blackhead Removal, LHA Peeling, Vegan, 60 pads, 4.9oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, March 1 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 19 hrs 3 mins
features: Obliterate sebum and blackheads with trident-shaped pads: The 780 fine trident-shaped bumps on each pad effectively eliminates blackheads, sebum, and waste found in pores. Pads have plaid-like design to best mimic the texture of skin to provide a non-irritating, soothing deep cleanse.
Brightens skin, non-comedogenic certified: Clinically tested and verified for its skin brightening effects. Contains patented AC control complex ingredients for secure, confident use on damaged skin.
Vegan pads: Made from 100% plant-derived natural fibers. Certified cruelty-free and vegan by PETA.
Derematest-certified hypoallergenic product: Worried about irritation from trident-shaped bumps on pads? These are hypoallergenic pads rated Excellent by the German Dermatest.

How to use: After washing your face, use the rough side of the pad to wipe away the dead skin cells. Avoid using on eyes. For areas that require intensive care, such as areas prone to blackheads and whiteheads, wipe the skin once more with the soft side of the pad to smooth out your skin texture. Pat the pad all over your face to absorb the remaining product on the pad. To use the pad like a face mask, stick the pad on your face and leave on for about 10 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The smell is so refreshing!
reviews.reviewText: It’s my first time trying this kind of pads, and I really liked the smell. The smell is so refreshing. I think the pads are rough enough to clean without irritating the skin, at least for me.The other thing I liked is that they come with little thongs inside the jar cover, so you can get the pads individually without using your hand. This is a great way to promote good hygiene with this kind of product.After using it, I did feel my skin softer and cleaner, and it was a pleasure doing the treatment with that beautiful, refreshing smell.Hopefully, I’ll see great results after I keep using the pads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kbeauty skincare! Feels really nice! My face is getting very clean! lol
reviews.reviewText: Disclaimer: I did receive this item for free to try out. HOWEVER! All opinions are my own and I pride myself on unbiased reviews that can help others decide whether something is worth it.Made in Korea! Ugh Korean skincare products are always designed SO BEAUTIFULLY. It’s just soooo aesthetically pleasing!!! The container these pads come in is SOOOO nice. It feels super lux. Completely tamper-proof with the box having tape you have to cut through and this container itself you have to unscrew and then break the seal which also keeps this super fresh and moist. This container has a pop top lid and on the underside of the lid they provided just the cutest transparent mini tongs for you to use and pluck a toner pad out with. It’s SOOO nice and guarantees you don’t dirty the pads by using your fingers to dig in there. If your fingers aren’t completely clean and you dig in there you risk contamination and bacteria breeding. It’s really great that they thought of this! Supposedly this will skin brighten along with all the other amazinq qualities of a toner pad such as cleansing and removing oils and blackhead and other gross things.READ THE INSTRUCTIONS ON THE LISTING ITSELF! The container has minimal English instructions and it’s honestly not too great lol. The listing teaches you to use the rougher side of the pad to wipe away dead skin cells and to use the smoother/softer side to wipe areas with white/blackheads and it would smooth out your skin. I had no idea until I read it on the actual Amazon listing, they never mentioned it on the box. The pad indeed does have a rough side and a softer smooth side that I didn’t know what it was lol.These have a very light pleasant scent. It feels very cooling and nice on my skin and it feels really nice when I’m wiping/cleansing my face with it. I’m really enjoying these cleaning pads!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit pricey, but seem to work well
reviews.reviewText: First of all, the container is really nice. I'll want to find another use for it once the toner pads are gone. The pads have a pretty rough texture, so there's definitely exfoliating going on with each use. These do seem to leave my skin very clean. My skin is on the dry side, not oily, so I am probably not the target audience. I just really wanted to clear up the few blackheads where my nose meets my cheek. These seem to be working for that. I apply a hyaluronic acid serum while my skin is still damp from the toner and my skin is responding very well to that. These do not seem to irritate my skin, nor do they cause dryness. I do like them, but the cost is pretty high compared to cotton rounds and a bottle of toner. I will probably save these for travel now that I've given them a good try; not because they aren't good, but because they are a bit expensive at around 40 cents per pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was actually surprised with these pads. I hadn't expected them to be quite as effective as they were.The pads (60 in all) come in a very nice jar that is also the dispenser. You get a tiny pair of mini tweezers to pick them up with, and separate them. The tweezers stay on the inner lid.The pads themselves are very different from any others I had seen, or used. They are made of a very open weave material, like a thick cheesecloth. It seems to be more aggressive at removing dirt, oil and sebum... the things that cause blackheads.I have some areas on my nose that have fairly open pores, and they tend to develop blackheads. It was the perfect spot to test these pads. The pads are very saturated in the liquid that washes out the pores. Far more than other pads. They are also large pads. I'm accustomed to the pads that are popular in the US, which frankly are not effective, at all.These pads really did a good job. I felt as though the skin was cleaner, but I had to prove it to myself.I have one of those blackhead "sucker" machines, that is handheld. It actually pulls out the blackheads using suction. Though I dislike using it, it does seem to deep clean. Plus, you can see what it has removed from the skin.In my case after using the suction device there was barely anything left to pull out. This was really surprising, but also impressive.I thought that this was a bit pricey for a 60 day supply, but I was comparing to what was available retail in the US. Those products are relatively ineffective.This really worked well, and now I'm convinced that it's well worth the price. It has a nice, though a bit unusual scent. Not very strong, but pleasant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't do much for me
reviews.reviewText: I don't think these pads are doing much for my skin but they're not hurting either. They have a nice tea-tree smell and I use them when I'm feeling lazy about washing my face or don't want to wake myself up by splashing a bunch of water on my face right before bed.

reviews.reviewTitle: お肌に優しくしっかり汚れとれる。
reviews.reviewText: お肌に優しいヴィーガン処方。韓国コスメのヴィーガンは審査が厳しいらしく、とてもお肌に良い感じがします。頬とおでこ、毛穴の気になる小鼻に。乗せて優しくくるくるすると、ほぼ綺麗にスッキリと汚れが取れます（完璧では無いですが…）。内蓋にピンセットが付いており、60枚も入っているので思う存分使えました！

reviews.reviewTitle: 皮脂汚れをしっかり落とす
reviews.reviewText: いろんなメーカーのトナーパットを使っていますがその中でも結構硬めの質感だと感じます。加えて格子状の凹凸が他製品よりも多い印象です。この表面のトライデント突起が皮脂汚れや毛穴汚れをしっかり落としてくれるという製品のようですね。1枚1枚にアンプルがたっぷり染み込んでいて使い心地は刺激もなく、過度な保湿感もなくさっぱり使えます。特にざらつきが気になる小鼻やあご周りがつるんとするのが気持ちいい！メイク前はもちろん、肌をリフレッシュさせるのにうってつけです。

reviews.reviewTitle: 1回分、1パットで毛穴の黒ずみがスッキリ取れます
reviews.reviewText: 低刺激なヴィーガンパット香りは爽やかな若い木々のような香りに感じました洗顔後、大きな面（額、頬、顎ライン）次に小鼻顎（力を入れると梅干しのようになるところ）の順で拭き取りましたとてもスッキリしますし肌色がトーンアップしますもちろん小鼻など、毛穴の汚れも取れました1度で取れなくても頑張らず日を置いてから再度トライすると良いで乾燥肌でもコメドが綺麗に取れますし潤いを感じられました全肌質対応のクリーンパットです性別問わずオススメです
乾燥肌兼敏感肌のレビューです。夏にぴったりのサッパリ系パッドです。清潔感のある爽やかな香りなので、お風呂上がりに使うと清々しい気分になります。保湿力はほぼ無いので、使用後はしっかりめに保湿することをおすすめします。べたつくこれからの季節にはピッタリのアイテムですが、パッドの凸凹面で結構刺激を感じるので敏感肌の方は注意が必要です。

reviews.reviewTitle: 朝使うと化粧ノリが変わります！
reviews.reviewText: 拭き取り化粧水は初めて使いましたが、とても便利で毎朝重宝しています。こちらでさっとふいて少しだけたたいてそのあとスキンケアするだけでお化粧ノリがとても良くなりました。時間があるときは２枚貼り付けてパックのように使っています。毛穴も気にならなくなってきました。これからも使い続けたいです。
